title: [Feature Request] Search improvement
excerpt: Description I am very disappointed with how the search bar in paperless-ngx currently works. It requires me to type the exact phrase I am looking for, which makes searching unnecessarily difficult. I would greatly appreciate improvements to the search functionality. For example, given a document titled: “Document number one”, the search should also return results for: Skipping words: Document one
